verbose_text: In the model of functional overload and trans-aortic constriction (TAC) induced hypertrophy, the expression of miR-1 is down-regulated to half through binding of the 3'UTR of target genes, cyclin dependent kinase 9, Ras GTPase activating protein, fibronectin, and Ras-homolog enriched in the brain [XREF_BIBR], which was closely linked to the regulation of genes related to calcium.
